entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Brampton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 11:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.4°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to a few flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Fog. Low zero. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
